mapper.sql: site_id, site_model, site_create_time, site_area, green_grass_type, site_param, site_designer, fairway_length, fairway_grass_type, site_address, site_city, site_phone, service1, service2, service3, service4, service5, service6, service7, service8, service9, shelves_time, shelf_time, sales_volume, weekdays_ef_member_price, weekdays_site_member_price, weekdays_customer_price, holiday_ef_member_price, holiday_site_member_price, holiday_customer_price, reserve_explain, cancel_explain, site_remarks, site_jw, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, reserve4, reserve5, create_time, modify_time, create_user, modify_user,site_introduction, qiuhui_id

site_id, site_model, site_create_time, site_area, green_grass_type, site_param, site_designer, fairway_length, fairway_grass_type, site_address, site_city, site_phone, service1, service2, service3, shelves_time, shelf_time, sales_volume, weekdays_ef_member_price, weekdays_site_member_price, weekdays_customer_price, holiday_ef_member_price, holiday_site_member_price, holiday_customer_price, reserve_explain, cancel_explain, site_remarks, site_jw, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, reserve4, reserve5, create_time, modify_time, create_user, modify_user, qiuhui_id
mapper.select:
select
from ef_site where site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND reserve3 = '1'

select s.site_id siteID, site_model siteModel, site_param siteParam, s.reserve4 siteName, s.site_address siteAddr, CASE WHEN esp.price=0 THEN '暂无' ELSE esp.price END minPrice, i.url picUrl, s.reserve5
, ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #{reserve2} * PI() / 180 - reserve2 * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS(#{reserve2} * PI() / 180) * COS(reserve2 * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN( ( #{reserve1} * PI() / 180 - reserve1 * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) AS distance, count(c.comments_id) commentNum, IFNULL(sum(c.praise_num),0) praiseNum
from ef_site s left join ef_siteimg i on i.product_id = s.site_id and i.type = 1 LEFT JOIN ef_comments c ON c.product_id = s.site_id LEFT JOIN ef_site_price esp ON (s.site_id=esp.site_id AND DATE_FORMAT(esp.c_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) where 1=1 AND reserve3 = '1'
AND s.site_city LIKE "%"#{siteCity}"%"
AND s.reserve4 LIKE "%"#{reserve4}"%"
GROUP BY s.site_id
ORDER by s.reserve5 ASC,s.sort ASC
ORDER BY esp.price,s.reserve5, distance ASC
ORDER BY distance,esp.price,s.reserve5 ASC
ORDER by reserve5 ASC,s.sort ASC
mapper.insert: insert into ef_site (site_id, site_model, site_create_time, site_area, green_grass_type, site_param, site_designer, fairway_length, fairway_grass_type, site_address, site_city, site_phone, service1, service2, service3, service4, service5, service6, service7, service8, service9, shelves_time, shelf_time, sales_volume, weekdays_ef_member_price, weekdays_site_member_price, reserve5, create_time, modify_time, create_user, modify_user, site_introduction) values (#{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{greenGrassType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteDesigner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fairwayLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.update:
update ef_site
site_model = #{siteModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_create_time = #{siteCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_area = #{siteArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
green_grass_type = #{greenGrassType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_param = #{siteParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_designer = #{siteDesigner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fairway_length = #{fairwayLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fairway_grass_type = #{fairwayGrassType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_address = #{siteAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_city = #{siteCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_phone = #{sitePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service1 = #{service1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service2 = #{service2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service3 = #{service3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service4 = #{service4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service5 = #{service5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service6 = #{service6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service7 = #{service7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service8 = #{service8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service9 = #{service9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shelves_time = #{shelvesTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shelf_time = #{shelfTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sales_volume = #{salesVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weekdays_ef_member_price = #{weekdaysEfMemberPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weekdays_site_member_price = #{weekdaysSiteMemberPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weekdays_customer_price = #{weekdaysCustomerPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holiday_ef_member_price = #{holidayEfMemberPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holiday_site_member_price = #{holidaySiteMemberPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holiday_customer_price = #{holidayCustomerPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve_explain = #{reserveExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cancel_explain = #{cancelExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_remarks = #{siteRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_jw = #{siteJw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_introduction = #{siteIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

site_introduction = #{siteIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

= #{fairwayGrassType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_address = #{siteAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_city = #{siteCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_phone = #{sitePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service1 = #{service1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service2 = #{service2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service3 = #{service3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service4 = #{service4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service5 = #{service5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service6 = #{service6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service7 = #{service7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service8 = #{service8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service9 = #{service9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shelves_time = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT es.site_jw lngAndLat, es.reserve4 SiteName, es.reserve1 lng, es.reserve2 lat FROM ef_site es WHERE es.site_city=#{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT es.qiuhui_id FROM ef_site es WHERE es.site_id=#{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT es.site_id siteId, es.reserve4 siteName, es.weekdays_site_member_price memberPrice, esp.price sitePrice, reserve_explain reserveExplain, cancel_explain cancleExplain, site_param siteParam FROM ef_site es JOIN ef_site_price esp ON es.site_id = esp.site_id WHERE es.site_id = #{siteId} and date(esp.c_date)=#{playDate}

SELECT es.site_id siteId, es.site_city siteCity, es.reserve4 reserve4, es.reserve1 reserve1, es.reserve2 reserve2, es.site_model siteModel, es.site_param siteParam, es.site_address siteAddress, esp.price price, esp.c_year cYear, esp.c_month cMonth, esp.c_day cDay, esp.c_week cWeek FROM ef_site es LEFT JOIN ef_site_price esp ON es.site_id = esp.site_id

SELECT es.site_id siteId, es.site_city siteCity, es.reserve4 reserve4, es.reserve1 reserve1, es.reserve2 reserve2, es.site_model siteModel, es.site_param siteParam, es.site_address siteAddress, esp.price price, esp.c_year cYear, esp.c_month cMonth, esp.c_day cDay, esp.c_week cWeek FROM ef_site es LEFT JOIN ef_site_price esp ON es.site_id = esp.site_id WHERE es.site_id = #{siteId}

select s.site_id siteID, site_model siteModel, site_param siteParam, s.reserve4 siteName, s.site_address siteAddr, CASE WHEN esp.price=0 THEN '暂无' ELSE esp.price END minPrice, i.url picUrl, s.reserve5, ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #{lon} * PI() / 180 - reserve2 * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS(#{lon} * PI() / 180) * COS(reserve2 * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN( ( #{lat} * PI() / 180 - reserve1 * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) AS distance, count(c.comments_id) commentNum, IFNULL(sum(c.praise_num),0) praiseNu from ef_site s left join ef_siteimg i on i.product_id = s.site_id and i.type = 1 LEFT JOIN ef_comments c ON c.product_id = s.site_id LEFT JOIN ef_site_price esp ON (s.site_id=esp.site_id AND DATE_FORMAT(esp.c_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) where 1 = 1 AND reserve3 = '1' AND s.qiuhui_id = #{qiuHuiId} GROUP BY s.site_id ORDER BY distance,esp.price,s.reserve5 asc
